item.title: The Future of Programming (by Bret Victor)
item.description: I watched this video some years ago, and it was a fascinating depiction of the early software industry, about how creative people were able to imagine solutions that even today may be considered science fiction. Hope you enjoy this video as I did. Bret Victor - The Future of Programming from Bret Victor on Vimeo.
